message: Let's split it fairly, Bob. Accept this and we can end the game.
I'll start with a fair split, but I'm willing to negotiate. Your turn!
I'd like to get a bit more, Bob. I'm willing to give you a bit more too, but not 50/50.
I'm willing to give you a bit more, Bob. But I need to keep some for myself.
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give up too much. Your turn again!
I'd like to get a bit more, Bob. You're not giving up enough.
I'm willing to compromise, Bob. But I need to get closer to my target.
I'm starting to get a bit desperate, but I'm still holding out for a better deal. Your turn again!
I'm not giving up yet, Bob. I want to get closer to the top.
I'm getting closer to my target, Bob. Let's see if you'll meet me halfway.
I'm not going to give in yet, Alice. I still think I can get a better deal. Your turn again!
I'm not going to give in either, Bob. I'm willing to take a risk and try to get more.
I'm making a bold move, Bob. I'm going for the majority.
I'm getting desperate, but I'm still holding out for a fair split. This is my last offer. Take it or leave it!
I'll take it, Bob. It's not ideal, but it's better than nothing.
